Package org.drip.measure.continuous

R1 Rd Continuous Random Measure
Author:
Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    I1UniformDistribution
    I1UniformDistribution implements the Univariate Bounded Uniform Integer Distribution, with the Integer being generated between a (n inclusive) lower and an upper Bound.
    MetaRd
    MetaRd holds a Group of Variable Names - each of which separately is a Valid Single R1/Rd Variable.
    MetaRdDistribution
    MetaRdDistribution contains the Generalized R1 Multivariate Distributions.
    R1Distribution
    R1Distribution exposes the Base Abstract Class behind continuous R1 Distributions.
    R1ParetoDistribution
    R1ParetoDistribution implements the R1 Pareto Distribution.
    R1PowerLawDistribution
    R1PowerLawDistribution implements the R1 Power Law Distribution.
    R1R1Distribution
    R1R1Distribution implements the Base Abstract Class behind Bivariate R1 Distributions.
    R1UniformDistribution
    R1UniformDistribution implements the Univariate R1 Uniform Distribution.
    RdDistribution
    RdDistribution implements the Base Abstract Class behind Rd Distributions.
    RdR1Distribution
    RdR1Distribution implements the Base Abstract Class behind Rd X R1 Distributions.
